titles.title: To authorize the conveyance of property in North Bonneville, Washington, to the Port of Skamania, and for other purposes.
To authorize the conveyance of property in North Bonneville, Washington, to the Port of Skamania, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to convey certain federal property in North Bonneville, Washington, to the Port of Skamania County, Washington. The property includes a lot and a storage building.
